Logic / Metric: Scrape Wayback Machine API. If H1 changes > 3 times in 6 months = Low Narrative Score.
Cosine similarity check between Website <title> and LinkedIn "About". Low similarity = Confused Positioning.
Count "Account Executive" vs. "SDR" roles. High SDR + Low AE = Low Velocity / Burnout Motion.
SimilarWeb (Global Rank) vs. Reddit/Twitter activity. High Rank + Zero Chatter = Leaky Bucket (Paid ads dependency).
Detect removal of expensive tools (e.g., dropping Segment/Mixpanel scripts) = Cash Conservation / PMF Loss.
Are they hiring for "Fintech Sales" then "Healthcare Sales"? High variance = ICP Thrashing.
